posts.post_title: *SOLD!*  Tobin's Black Border "Baby Kelly" Proof* Plus *SOLD!*
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Denny Walsh
 *SOLD!* 

What a Grand place to be! The Net54 Vintage Baseball Forum, Gotta Love it [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Life's Grand,
Denny Walsh 

Along with the Tobin's Black Border "Baby Kelly" (inwhich I believe to be a Proof ~ I was about to send it into SGC, but I've recently been called to Iraq), I also have a "Baby Lord Fauntleroy" and the infamous "The Pitcher", which I believe is from a set of 10. The Black Borders both have the same back and "The Pitcher's" back is blank. 
  These all where produced in the 1880's and are in remarkable condition for their age!

Prices are as follows(Includes Delivery), 1st "I'll Take it or them, Owns'em!" (Please followUp with an email to irishdenny17@yahoo.com)

*Please Note:  I Won't be able to check my email or the board til Tomorrow sometime, Briefly! Then Not til Monday afternoon.


Life's Grand,
Denny Walsh
